npc_dota_hero_antimage.antimage_mana_break: Burns an opponent's mana on each attack and deals damage equal to a percentage of the mana burnt.
npc_dota_hero_antimage.antimage_blink: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.
npc_dota_hero_antimage.antimage_counterspell: Passively grants magic resistance. Counterspell may be activated to create an anti-magic shell around Anti-Mage that blocks and reflects any targeted spells.
npc_dota_hero_antimage.antimage_persectur: Attacks slow enemies based on how much mana they are missing. Min slow at 50% mana, up to max slow at 0% mana. No effect if enemy is above 50% mana.
npc_dota_hero_antimage.antimage_mana_void: For each point of mana missing by the target unit, damage is dealt to it and surrounding enemies. The main target is also mini-stunned.

npc_dota_hero_axe.axe_berserkers_call: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him while he gains bonus armor during the duration.
npc_dota_hero_axe.axe_battle_hunger: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. The enemy is slowed as long as they are facing away from Axe.
npc_dota_hero_axe.axe_counter_helix: After a set number of attacks, Axe will perform a helix counter attack, dealing pure damage to all nearby enemies.
npc_dota_hero_axe.axe_culling_blade: Axe spots a weakness and strikes, dealing pure damage. When an enemy hero is killed with Culling Blade, its cooldown is reset, and all nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed and armor.
npc_dota_hero_axe.axe_coat_of_blood: Axe permanently drenches his blade every time he kills an enemy Hero, gaining 0.2 bonus armor for each stack. Killing with Culling Blade gives 3x stacks.

npc_dota_hero_bane.bane_enfeeble: Deals damage every second and lowers the enemy's total attack damage and cast range.
npc_dota_hero_bane.bane_brain_sap: Feasts on the vital energies of an enemy unit, healing Bane and dealing damage.
npc_dota_hero_bane.bane_nightmare: Puts the target enemy or friendly Hero to sleep. Sleeping units are awakened when damaged. If the target was directly attacked, the Nightmare passes to the attacking unit. Bane can attack and damage Nightmared targets freely.
npc_dota_hero_bane.bane_fiends_grip: CHANNELED - Grips an enemy unit, disabling it and causing heavy damage over time, while stealing mana every 0.5 seconds based on the unit's maximum mana.
npc_dota_hero_bane.bane_ichor_of_nyctasha: Bane's attribute gains are always evenly distributed across all three attributes (items that grant +3 Strength will now grant +1 Str/Agi/Int).

npc_dota_hero_bloodseeker.bloodseeker_bloodrage: Drives Bloodseeker or an allied hero into a bloodthirsty rage which causes them to attack faster and deal more spell damage at the cost of a percentage of their health per second. Provides half attack speed to allied heroes.
npc_dota_hero_bloodseeker.bloodseeker_blood_bath: Bloodseeker baptizes an area in sacred blood. After 2.9 seconds the ritual completes, causing any enemies caught in the area to take damage and become silenced.
npc_dota_hero_bloodseeker.bloodseeker_thirst: Bloodseeker is invigorated by the wounds of his enemies, gaining bonus movement speed when an enemy hero's health falls below 100%, with the bonuses increasing as their health falls further. If an enemy hero's health falls below 25%, he will also gain vision and True Sight of that hero. Bonuses stack per hero. Unlocks max movement speed for Bloodseeker.
npc_dota_hero_bloodseeker.bloodseeker_sanguivore:
Bloodseeker restores some life when he kills a unit, equal to 30 health plus a percentage of the units max health.

Restores for half values if an ally kills a nearby enemy hero.
npc_dota_hero_bloodseeker.bloodseeker_rupture: Causes an enemy unit's skin to rupture, dealing initial damage based on its current health. If the unit moves, it takes damage based on the distance moved.

npc_dota_hero_crystal_maiden.crystal_maiden_crystal_nova: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement in the targeted area.
npc_dota_hero_crystal_maiden.crystal_maiden_frostbite: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing damage over time. Deals 4x damage to non-ancient creeps.
npc_dota_hero_crystal_maiden.crystal_maiden_brilliance_aura: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. Allies within a 1200 radius of Crystal Maiden receive 3x the mana regeneration.
npc_dota_hero_crystal_maiden.crystal_maiden_crystal_clone: Slides in a direction, creating a crystal clone of herself in her place and disjointing incoming projectiles. If the clone takes enough damage or times out, it shatters, Frostbiting enemies in a 450 AoE around its place. The Clone can also be destroyed by Crystal Maiden's own spells.
npc_dota_hero_crystal_maiden.crystal_maiden_blueheart_floe: Crystal Maiden has 25% Mana Regeneration Amplification.
npc_dota_hero_crystal_maiden.crystal_maiden_freezing_field: CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with 100 random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage. Lasts 10 seconds.

npc_dota_hero_drow_ranger.drow_ranger_frost_arrows: Adds a freezing effect to Drow's attacks, slowing enemy movement and dealing bonus damage. Slow lasts 1.5 seconds.
npc_dota_hero_drow_ranger.drow_ranger_wave_of_silence: Releases a wave that silences and knocks back and reveals invisible enemy units. Knockback distance is relative to how close they are to Drow.
npc_dota_hero_drow_ranger.drow_ranger_multishot: CHANNELED - Drow releases a flurry of arrows in continuous salvos, hitting enemies for extra damage and applying Frost Arrows. Lasts up to 1.75 seconds.
npc_dota_hero_drow_ranger.drow_ranger_glacier: Drow creates a hill of ice beneath her. While standing on the hill, attackers gain bonus attack range and high ground advantage - they cannot miss and gain flying vision. Drow additionally gets bonus Multishot arrows per wave while on the hill. The front of the hill obscures vision and cannot be moved through except by Drow. Does not interrupt Multishot when cast.
npc_dota_hero_drow_ranger.drow_ranger_trueshot: Grants Drow bonus agility based on Drow's current agility and level. Nearby ranged heroes received 50% of the bonus agility.
npc_dota_hero_drow_ranger.drow_ranger_marksmanship: Drow's experiences in battle grant her a chance to launch arrows with incredible accuracy and effectiveness. Pierces through the enemy's defenses, ignoring their base armor. This ability is disabled if there is an enemy hero within 325 range.

npc_dota_hero_earthshaker.earthshaker_fissure: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, creating an impassable ridge of stone while stunning and damaging enemy units along its line.
npc_dota_hero_earthshaker.earthshaker_enchant_totem: Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage and have 100 bonus attack range on the next attack.
npc_dota_hero_earthshaker.earthshaker_aftershock: Causes the earth to shake underfoot, adding additional damage and stuns to nearby enemy units when Earthshaker casts his abilities.
npc_dota_hero_earthshaker.earthshaker_echo_slam: Shockwaves travel through the ground, damaging enemy units. Each enemy hit causes an echo to damage nearby units. Real heroes cause two echoes.
npc_dota_hero_earthshaker.earthshaker_slugger: Enemies killed with Enchant Totem or Earthshaker's other abilities are sent flying, dealing damage to enemies they hit.

npc_dota_hero_juggernaut.juggernaut_blade_fury: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him debuff immune, increasing his magic resistance by 80%, and dealing damage every 0.2s to nearby enemy units. Applies a strong dispel at the end of the spin.
npc_dota_hero_juggernaut.juggernaut_healing_ward: Summons a Healing Ward which heals all nearby allied units, based on their max health. The Healing Ward moves at 325 movement speed after being summoned. Lasts 25 seconds.
npc_dota_hero_juggernaut.juggernaut_blade_dance: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal critical damage on each attack.
npc_dota_hero_juggernaut.juggernaut_swift_slash: Performs a short Omnislash for 1 seconds.
npc_dota_hero_juggernaut.juggernaut_duelist: Juggernaut deals 12% more damage to targets that are facing him. Damage bonus always applies during Omnislash.
npc_dota_hero_juggernaut.juggernaut_omni_slash:
Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy units, and then slashes the target and other nearby enemy units at an increased attack rate. Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

npc_dota_hero_mirana.mirana_starfall: Calls down a wave of meteors to damage nearby enemy units. The closest enemy unit to Mirana in a 675 radius will be struck a second time.
npc_dota_hero_mirana.mirana_arrow: Fires a long-range arrow with deadly precision, which stuns and damages the first enemy unit it strikes. The stun duration ranges from 0.01 to 2.6 seconds, with bonus damage up to 180 added, based on the distance the arrow travels to its target. Instantly kills the first non-ancient creep it hits.
npc_dota_hero_mirana.mirana_leap: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering herself with a ferocious roar that grants bonus attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts 5 seconds.
npc_dota_hero_mirana.mirana_selemenes_faithful: Healing Lotuses are 50% more effective on Mirana and her allies.
npc_dota_hero_mirana.mirana_invis: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible and grants bonus movement speed. Mirana gains bonus outgoing damage during the duration. If a hero is revealed, invisibility will restore after the fade delay as long as Moonlight Shadow's duration has not expired.

npc_dota_hero_nevermore.nevermore_shadowraze1: Shadow Fiend razes the ground directly in front of him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadowraze damage per stack.
npc_dota_hero_nevermore.nevermore_shadowraze2: Shadow Fiend razes the ground a short distance away from him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadowraze damage per stack.
npc_dota_hero_nevermore.nevermore_shadowraze3: Shadow Fiend razes the ground a longer distance away from him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadowraze damage per stack.
npc_dota_hero_nevermore.nevermore_frenzy: Shadow Fiend gains Bonus Attack Speed and Movement Speed for 8 seconds. For the duration of the effect, Necromastery's Max Soul count is increased by 5, but he loses that amount of souls after it is done.
npc_dota_hero_nevermore.nevermore_dark_lord: Shadow Fiend's presence reduces the armor of nearby enemies.
npc_dota_hero_nevermore.nevermore_requiem:
Shadow Fiend gathers his captured souls to release them as lines of demonic energy. Units near Shadow Fiend when the souls are released can be damaged by several lines of energy. Any unit damaged by Requiem of Souls will be feared and have its movement speed and magic resistance reduced for 0.6 seconds for each line hit up to a maximum of 2.15. Lines of energy are created for every soul captured through Necromastery. 

 Requiem of Souls is automatically cast whenever Shadow Fiend dies, regardless of its cooldown.
npc_dota_hero_nevermore.nevermore_necromastery: Shadow Fiend steals the soul from units he kills, gaining bonus damage. Hero kills grant 4 souls. On death, he releases 30% of them from bondage.

npc_dota_hero_morphling.morphling_waveform: Morphling dissolves into liquid and surges forward, damaging enemy units in his path. Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform.
npc_dota_hero_morphling.morphling_adaptive_strike_agi:
Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, dealing base damage plus additional damage based on Morphling's agility times a multiplier. If Morphling's agility is 50% higher than strength, the maximum agility multiplier is used.

The target is also knocked back and stunned based on Morphling's strength. If his strength is 50% higher than his agility, the maximum knockback distance and stun is used.
npc_dota_hero_morphling.morphling_morph_agi: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Strength and pouring them into Agility. The process is reversible. Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change.
npc_dota_hero_morphling.morphling_morph_str: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Agility and pouring them into Strength. The process is reversible. Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change.
npc_dota_hero_morphling.morphling_replicate: Morphling changes his form to match the targeted enemy, gaining their basic abilities. Can be toggled for the duration of the ability.
npc_dota_hero_morphling.morphling_morph_replicate: Toggles Morphling's form between his own and the replicated enemy.
npc_dota_hero_morphling.morphling_accumulation: Morphling receives 50% of stat growth bonuses every half level instead of the full bonus at level up. All Attributes bonuses from skill points in the Talent Tree provide an additional +3 to Morphling's primary attribute.

npc_dota_hero_phantom_lancer.phantom_lancer_spirit_lance: Sends a magical spirit lance to a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while summoning an illusory phantom to attack the unit.
npc_dota_hero_phantom_lancer.phantom_lancer_doppelwalk:
Phantom Lancer briefly vanishes from the battlefield. After 1 second, Phantom Lancer and any of his nearby illusions reappear at a random position within the targeted location, along with two additional doppelgangers. Extends duration of all illusions. The two added doppelgangers have different properties: one takes normal damage and deals none, while the other takes 500% bonus damage and deals -80% less damage.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
npc_dota_hero_phantom_lancer.phantom_lancer_phantom_edge: When targeting an enemy for an attack, Phantom Lancer quickly charges into range, gaining bonus movement speed and evasion. Phantom Lancer's illusions also have this ability.
npc_dota_hero_phantom_lancer.phantom_lancer_illusory_armaments: Whenever an illusion of Phantom Lancer is created, its outgoing damage cannot go below a fixed value for 3 seconds.
npc_dota_hero_phantom_lancer.phantom_lancer_juxtapose: Phantom Lancer has a chance to fracture his presence on an attack, creating an illusion of himself. Illusions also have a chance to fracture further. Illusions created from Phantom Lancer last for 8 seconds, while illusions created from other illusions last 4 seconds.

npc_dota_hero_puck.puck_illusory_orb: Puck launches a magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.
npc_dota_hero_puck.puck_waning_rift: Puck teleports to the target location and releases a burst of faerie dust that deals damage and silences enemy units nearby.
npc_dota_hero_puck.puck_phase_shift: CHANNELED - Puck briefly shifts into another dimension where it is immune from harm.
npc_dota_hero_puck.puck_ethereal_jaunt: Teleports Puck to a flying Illusory Orb.
npc_dota_hero_puck.puck_puckish: Whenever Puck disjoints an attack, it restores 10 + 2% of its max mana and 10 + 2% of its max health. Dodging a targeted spell projectile restores 3.5x that amount. Does not apply to attacks by Towers.
npc_dota_hero_puck.puck_dream_coil: Creates a coil of volatile magic that latches onto enemy Heroes, damaging and leashing them. If the enemy hero stretches the coil by moving too far away, it snaps, stunning and dealing additional damage.

npc_dota_hero_pudge.pudge_meat_hook: Launches a bloody hook toward a unit or location. The hook will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit back to Pudge, killing it if it's a non-ancient creep and dealing damage if it is an enemy otherwise.
npc_dota_hero_pudge.pudge_rot: A toxic cloud that deals intense damage and slows movement--harming not only enemy units but Pudge himself.
npc_dota_hero_pudge.pudge_flesh_heap: Pudge covers himself with a layer of flesh that blocks damage of any type taken from any source.
npc_dota_hero_pudge.pudge_innate_graft_flesh: Pudge's skin thickens permanently every time he kills an enemy Hero, gaining 1.1 bonus Strength for each stack.
npc_dota_hero_pudge.pudge_dismember: CHANNELED - Pudge chows down on an enemy unit, disabling it and dealing damage over time. Damage is increased by Pudge's Strength and heals him for the total amount. Pudge pulls the unit at a rate of 75 units, up to a minimum of 125 range.

npc_dota_hero_razor.razor_plasma_field: Releases a wave of energetic plasma that grows in power as it expands, but also zaps on contraction, slowing and dealing damage to enemy units caught in its path. Damage and slow increases with distance from Razor. The Plasma Field hits each unit twice, once each direction.
npc_dota_hero_razor.razor_static_link: Creates a charged link between Razor and an enemy Hero, stealing damage from the target and giving it to Razor. Allows Razor to attack while moving with the link active.
npc_dota_hero_razor.razor_storm_surge: There's a chance when attacked, and always when targeted with a spell, to release a forked lightning that strikes the target and other nearby enemies, prioritizing the unit type of the attacker, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.
npc_dota_hero_razor.razor_eye_of_the_storm: A powerful lightning storm strikes out at the enemy unit with the lowest health, dealing damage and reducing armor.

npc_dota_hero_sand_king.sandking_burrowstrike:
Sand King burrows into the ground and tunnels forward, damaging and stunning enemy units above him as he resurfaces. Adds Caustic Finale poison to heroes hit

 Can be put on alt-cast to immediately cast in the desired direction, without walking towards the targeted location.
npc_dota_hero_sand_king.sandking_sand_storm: Sand King creates a fearsome sandstorm that damages enemy units and grants Sand King Invisibility while he is in it. The effect ends when Sand King leaves the area.
npc_dota_hero_sand_king.sandking_scorpion_strike: Sand King strikes an area, performing an attack on all enemies in the area of effect, dealing extra damage. Enemies within an innermost radius of 125 take 40% extra damage. Applies Caustic Finale and a slow to all enemies hit.
npc_dota_hero_sand_king.sandking_caustic_finale: Sand King's attacks inject a venom that causes enemy units to violently explode when they die.
npc_dota_hero_sand_king.sandking_epicenter: After a cast point of 2 seconds, Sand King sends a disturbance into the earth, causing it to shudder violently. All enemies caught within range will take damage and become slowed. Each subsequent pulse increases the radius of damage dealt.

npc_dota_hero_storm_spirit.storm_spirit_static_remnant: Creates an explosively charged image of Storm Spirit that lasts 12 seconds and will detonate and deal damage if an enemy unit comes near it.
npc_dota_hero_storm_spirit.storm_spirit_electric_vortex: A vortex that pulls an enemy unit to Storm Spirit's location.
npc_dota_hero_storm_spirit.storm_spirit_overload: Casting a spell creates an electrical charge, which is released in a burst on Storm's next attack, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies.
npc_dota_hero_storm_spirit.storm_spirit_ball_lightning: Storm Spirit becomes volatile electricity, charging across the battlefield until he depletes his mana or reaches his target. The activation mana cost is 25+7.5% of his total mana pool, and the cost per 100 units traveled is 10+0.65% of his total mana pool. Damage is expressed in damage per 100 units traveled.
npc_dota_hero_storm_spirit.storm_spirit_galvanized: Storm Spirit gains a charge of 0.2 mana regeneration per kill. Loses 2 charges per death. Leveling Ball Lightning gives Storm Spirit 3 bonus charges. Additionally every time he gains a charge he also gains 0.1 Mana Regen permanently.

npc_dota_hero_sven.sven_storm_bolt: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units in a small area around the target.
npc_dota_hero_sven.sven_great_cleave: Sven strikes with great force, cleaving all nearby enemy units with his attack.
npc_dota_hero_sven.sven_warcry: Sven's Warcry heartens his allied heroes for battle, increasing their armor and movement speed. Lasts 8 seconds.
npc_dota_hero_sven.sven_gods_strength: Sven channels his rogue strength, granting bonus damage and slow resistance for 30 seconds.
npc_dota_hero_sven.sven_vanquisher: Sven's attacks deal 20% bonus damage to stunned enemies.

npc_dota_hero_tiny.tiny_avalanche: Bombards an area with rocks, continously doing small intervals of damage and stun to enemy units.
npc_dota_hero_tiny.tiny_toss: Grabs the nearest unit in a 300 radius around Tiny, ally or enemy, and launches it at the target unit or rune to deal damage where they land.
npc_dota_hero_tiny.tiny_tree_grab: Grabs a tree to whack enemies on the head for a limited number of attacks. Grants bonus attack range. Attacks deal more damage and fully splash on units along the way. The tree can be thrown, to deal your attack to a unit at a distance.
npc_dota_hero_tiny.tiny_tree_channel: CHANNELED - Tiny channels to throw random trees within range towards the targeted area. Deals Tiny's attack damage to enemies in that area with each tree thrown.
npc_dota_hero_tiny.tiny_craggy_exterior: Enemies that attack Tiny receive a stacking debuff that lowers their attack damage with each stack.
npc_dota_hero_tiny.tiny_grow: Tiny gains craggy mass, increasing his attack damage, movement speed and armor, and toss power while slowing his attack speed.
npc_dota_hero_tiny.tiny_toss_tree: Throws the tree at the target unit, proccing your attack on it and splashing damage around the target.

npc_dota_hero_vengefulspirit.vengefulspirit_magic_missile: Fires a magic missile at an enemy unit, stunning and dealing damage.
npc_dota_hero_vengefulspirit.vengefulspirit_wave_of_terror: Vengeful Spirit lets loose a wicked cry, weakening the total attack damage and armor of enemies, and giving vision of the path ahead.
npc_dota_hero_vengefulspirit.vengefulspirit_command_aura: Vengeful Spirit's presence increases the damage of nearby friendly heroes.
npc_dota_hero_vengefulspirit.vengefulspirit_retribution: Whenever an enemy hero kills Vengeful Spirit, they get a debuff until their next death, causing Vengeful Spirit to deal 20% bonus damage to them.
npc_dota_hero_vengefulspirit.vengefulspirit_nether_swap: Instantaneously swaps positions with a target Hero, friend or enemy. Nether Swap interrupts channeling abilities on the target. Enemy Swapped units take damage. Vengeful Spirit and allied swapped units gain a barrier equal to the damage dealt.

npc_dota_hero_windrunner.windrunner_shackleshot: Shackles the target to an enemy unit or tree in a line directly behind it. If no unit or tree is present, the stun duration is reduced to 0.6.
npc_dota_hero_windrunner.windrunner_powershot: CHANNELED - Windranger charges her bow for up to 1 second for a single powerful shot, which deals more damage the longer it is charged. The arrow damages and slows enemies' movement speed along its path. For each enemy that Powershot hits, its damage and slow is reduced.
npc_dota_hero_windrunner.windrunner_windrun: Increases movement speed and adds evasion from all physical attacks.
npc_dota_hero_windrunner.windrunner_gale_force: Vector Targeted. Summons a strong wind that pushes all enemies in the target area towards the target direction.
npc_dota_hero_windrunner.windrunner_focusfire: Windranger channels the wind to gain 0 additional attack speed against a single enemy unit or structure, though with a reduction to her attack damage. Extra damage from secondary item effects is not reduced.
npc_dota_hero_windrunner.windrunner_easy_breezy: Windranger's movement speed cannot be lower than 240 and can reach 600.

npc_dota_hero_zuus.zuus_arc_lightning: Hurls a bolt of lightning that leaps through nearby enemy units that deal damage.
npc_dota_hero_zuus.zuus_lightning_bolt: Calls down a bolt of lightning to strike an enemy unit, causing damage and a mini-stun. When cast, Lightning Bolt briefly provides unobstructed vision and True Sight around the target in a 500 radius. Can be cast on the ground, affecting the closest enemy hero in 325 range.
npc_dota_hero_zuus.zuus_heavenly_jump: Zeus performs a Heavenly Jump, leaping forward and shocking the closest visible nearby enemy (prioritizing heroes), dealing damage as well as reducing their movement and attack speed. Zeus gets 900 unobstructed vision around him for 3 seconds.
npc_dota_hero_zuus.zuus_cloud: Creates a storm cloud anywhere on the map that automatically casts Lightning Bolt on nearby enemies.
npc_dota_hero_zuus.zuus_lightning_hands: Zeus gains bonus attack speed and his attacks create Arc Lightnings that deal a percentage of its damage. Can be toggled off to stop this effect.
npc_dota_hero_zuus.zuus_thundergods_wrath:
Strikes all enemy heroes with a bolt of lightning, dealing damage, no matter where they may be.

Thundergod's Wrath also provides True Sight around each hero struck. If an enemy hero is invisible, it takes no damage, but the True Sight is still created at that hero's location.
npc_dota_hero_zuus.zuus_static_field: Zeus shocks any enemy that he attacks or is hit by his abilities, causing damage equal to a percentage of their current health.

npc_dota_hero_kunkka.kunkka_torrent: Summons a rising torrent that, after a short delay, hurls enemy units into the sky, stunning, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.
npc_dota_hero_kunkka.kunkka_tidebringer: Kunkka's legendary sword grants increased damage and cleaves a large area of effect in front of him for a single strike.
npc_dota_hero_kunkka.kunkka_x_marks_the_spot: Targets a friendly or enemy Hero, marks their position with an X, and returns them to it after several seconds. Kunkka can trigger the return at any time during the duration. Lasts twice as long on allied heroes.
npc_dota_hero_kunkka.kunkka_tidal_wave: Releases a Tidal Wave that spawns behind Kunkka. Deals damage and drags enemies along it. Enemies cannot attack while being dragged.
npc_dota_hero_kunkka.kunkka_ghostship: Summons a ghostly ship that sails through the battle before smashing apart, damaging and stunning all enemies caught near the wreckage. Allied heroes touched by the Ghostship are given a strong swig of The Admiral's Rum, receiving bonus movement speed and a delayed reaction to incoming damage.
npc_dota_hero_kunkka.kunkka_return: Returns the marked hero to the X.

npc_dota_hero_lina.lina_dragon_slave: Lina channels the breath of a dragon, sending out a wave of fire that scorches every enemy in its path.
npc_dota_hero_lina.lina_light_strike_array: Summons a column of flames that damages and stuns enemies.
npc_dota_hero_lina.lina_fiery_soul: Grants bonus attack and movement speed each time Lina hits an enemy with a spell. Stacks with itself. Lasts 18 seconds.
npc_dota_hero_lina.lina_flame_cloak: Grants Lina unobstructed movement and increases her spell damage and magic resistance. Grants max fiery soul stacks on activation.
npc_dota_hero_lina.lina_combustion: Every 175 damage Lina does to an enemy hero causes them to overheat, doing damage to their nearby allies. This effect can trigger multiple times off a single instance of damage. Overheated illusions do less damage.
npc_dota_hero_lina.lina_laguna_blade: Fires off a bolt of lightning at a single enemy unit, dealing massive damage.

npc_dota_hero_lich.lich_frost_nova: Blasts the target enemy unit with damaging frost, dealing area damage and slowing movement and attack rates for 4 seconds. The primary target receives both base and area damage.
npc_dota_hero_lich.lich_frost_shield: Applies a magical frost shield around the target, reducing damage from attacks against it. While the shield is active, ice magic will affect nearby enemy units every 1 seconds, dealing minor damage and slowing them.
npc_dota_hero_lich.lich_sinister_gaze: CHANNELED - Hypnotizes an enemy unit, causing it to move towards a point between the two of you and drains a percentage of its current mana.
npc_dota_hero_lich.lich_ice_spire:
Creates an Ice Spire at the target spot, slowing enemies around it. Can take 4 hero hits or 8 creep hits and when destroyed it will create a Frost Blast around it.

Chain Frost can be cast on the Spire and can bounce to the Spire and damage the spire by 1 hero attack if there are no other enemies in range.

Lich can cast Frost Shield on the Spire. Each Frost Shield tick will heal the spire by 1 hero attack.
npc_dota_hero_lich.lich_death_charge: Lich cannot gain passive mana regeneration, but any unit dying within 1500 range of Lich restores 2.5% of his Max Mana (Dying heroes restore 25% of Lich's Max Mana). Instant mana restoration from items and abilities apply to Lich as normal.
npc_dota_hero_lich.lich_chain_frost: Releases an orb of frost that bounces between nearby enemy units up to 10 times, slowing and damaging each time it hits. Each bounce increases the damage for the subsequent bounces. Chain Frost lingers on its last target if it fails to bounce and can bounce again if new targets become available.

npc_dota_hero_lion.lion_impale: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
npc_dota_hero_lion.lion_voodoo: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless beast, with all special abilities disabled.
npc_dota_hero_lion.lion_mana_drain:
CHANNELED - Channels magical energy, taking mana and slowing enemies over time. If the enemy has no mana remaining, the slow is increased by 15%. 

 Can target allies to give them mana and movement speed at a 50% rate.
npc_dota_hero_lion.lion_to_hell_and_back: Lion gains 20% debuff duration and 20% spell amplification for 90s after respawning.
npc_dota_hero_lion.lion_finger_of_death: Rips at an enemy unit, trying to turn it inside-out. Deals massive damage and grows stronger with each life it consumes.

npc_dota_hero_shadow_shaman.shadow_shaman_ether_shock: Creates a cone of ethereal energy that strikes multiple enemy units.
npc_dota_hero_shadow_shaman.shadow_shaman_voodoo: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless creature, disabling their attacks and abilities.
npc_dota_hero_shadow_shaman.shadow_shaman_shackles: CHANNELED - Magically binds an enemy unit so that it cannot move or attack, absorbing their life energy over time.
npc_dota_hero_shadow_shaman.shadow_shaman_fowl_play:
When taking lethal damage, Shadow Shaman receives a strong dispel and survives as a 1 HP chicken. Incoming damage is reduced to zero for 1s.Cooldown is reset upon respawning.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
npc_dota_hero_shadow_shaman.shadow_shaman_mass_serpent_ward: Summons 10 Serpent Wards to attack enemy units and structures. The Wards are immune to magic. Creeps deal half damage to the Serpent Ward.

npc_dota_hero_slardar.slardar_sprint: Slardar slithers ahead, moving significantly faster and passing through units.
npc_dota_hero_slardar.slardar_slithereen_crush: Slams the ground, leaving a puddle of water, and stunning and damaging nearby enemy units. After the stun, the affected units are slowed.
npc_dota_hero_slardar.slardar_bash: After 3 attacks, your next attack will bash the target.
npc_dota_hero_slardar.slardar_seaborn_sentinel: Slardar gains bonus movement speed, health regeneration, attack damage, and armor while in a puddle, trail, or river.
npc_dota_hero_slardar.slardar_amplify_damage: Reduces enemy armor to amplify physical damage and provides True Sight and vision of the targeted unit, revealing invisibility. The enemy unit leaves a trail of water behind it.

npc_dota_hero_tidehunter.tidehunter_gush: Summons a gush of water to damage an enemy unit, reducing their movement speed and armor.
npc_dota_hero_tidehunter.tidehunter_kraken_shell:
Thickens Tidehunter's hide to passively block a portion of any incoming physical attack damage. Reduced block amount versus creeps.

Can be activated to double the block amount at the cost of 40% movement speed. Lasts 4s.
npc_dota_hero_tidehunter.tidehunter_anchor_smash: Tidehunter swings his mighty anchor to attack and deal bonus damage to nearby enemies and reduce their attack damage.
npc_dota_hero_tidehunter.tidehunter_dead_in_the_water: Tidehunter attaches a heavy anchor to an enemy hero. The hero is leashed while attached to the anchor. Attempting to move more than 350 units away from the anchor forces the hero to 100 move speed, dragging the anchor behind them. The anchor can be destroyed with 4 hero attacks.
npc_dota_hero_tidehunter.tidehunter_ravage: Slams the ground, causing tentacles to erupt in all directions, damaging and stunning all nearby enemy units.
npc_dota_hero_tidehunter.tidehunter_blubber:
Tidehunter's hide removes negative status effects if he takes more than 450 damage. Removes most debuffs, even if they are generally not purgable.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

npc_dota_hero_witch_doctor.witch_doctor_paralyzing_cask: Launches a cask of paralyzing powder that ricochets between enemy units, stunning and damaging those it hits. Damage increases each bounce.
npc_dota_hero_witch_doctor.witch_doctor_voodoo_restoration: Witch Doctor focuses his magic to heal nearby allied units, costing Witch Doctor mana every second Voodoo Restoration is active.
npc_dota_hero_witch_doctor.witch_doctor_maledict: Curses all enemy Heroes and player-controlled units in a small area, causing them to take a set amount of damage each second, as well as bursts of damage every 4 seconds based on how much health they have lost since the curse began.
npc_dota_hero_witch_doctor.witch_doctor_voodoo_switcheroo: Turns Witch Doctor into a Death Ward briefly with reduced attack speed. He is hidden during this time.
npc_dota_hero_witch_doctor.witch_doctor_gris_gris:
Witch Doctor gets a Gris-Gris, an item that cannot be dropped or placed in the backpack. When the owner dies, 100% of the gold lost from death is added to the item, and will be refunded when the item is consumed. The value of the Gris-Gris is increased by 1 every 3s. 

 Right-click to consume and permanently remove the item.
npc_dota_hero_witch_doctor.witch_doctor_death_ward: CHANNELED - Summons a deadly ward to attack enemy heroes within its attack range. Lasts a maximum of 8 seconds. Death Ward has 50% bonus accuracy.

npc_dota_hero_riki.riki_smoke_screen: Throws down a smoke bomb, silencing enemies and causing them to miss attacks.
npc_dota_hero_riki.riki_blink_strike: Teleports behind the target unit, momentarily slowing them and attacking them with bonus damage if it is an enemy.
npc_dota_hero_riki.riki_tricks_of_the_trade: CHANNELED - Riki phases out of the world and periodically strikes 2 random enemy units from behind in an area around him. He has fixed attack damage while phased out.
npc_dota_hero_riki.riki_innate_backstab: Every time Riki strikes his enemy from behind, he deals additional bonus damage equal to a multiple of his Agility.
npc_dota_hero_riki.riki_backstab: Riki fades into the shadows, becoming invisible until he attacks. Hero kills and assists grant additional experience.

npc_dota_hero_enigma.enigma_malefice: Focuses Enigma's power on a target, causing it to take damage and become repeatedly stunned for multiple instances. An instance strikes every 2 seconds.
npc_dota_hero_enigma.enigma_demonic_conversion: Summons three fragments of Enigma himself at the cost of health. The eidolons health is increased by 3% of Enigma's current health. These eidolons are all under Enigma's control, and repeated successful attacks cause them to multiply. When this happens, the eidolons have their health restored.
npc_dota_hero_enigma.enigma_midnight_pulse: Steeps an area in dark resonance, dealing damage to enemies every 0.5s.
npc_dota_hero_enigma.enigma_gravity_well: Allies within 500 distance from Enigma have up to 9% Damage Reduction. Effect starts at 0% at max distance and increases to its maximum strength when the ally is at 200 distance. Does not affect Enigma itself.
npc_dota_hero_enigma.enigma_black_hole: CHANNELED - Summons a vortex that sucks in nearby enemy units. Enemies affected by Black Hole cannot move, attack, or cast spells.

npc_dota_hero_tinker.tinker_laser: Fires an intense energy beam, damaging and blinding the target. Blinded targets miss all physical attacks.
npc_dota_hero_tinker.tinker_march_of_the_machines: Enlists an army of robotic minions to destroy enemy units in an area around Tinker.
npc_dota_hero_tinker.tinker_defense_matrix: Targets an allied unit, applying an all damage barrier to them that also provides Status Resistance.
npc_dota_hero_tinker.tinker_warp_grenade:
Throws a flare towards an enemy, dealing damage, teleporting them away, rooting them and reducing their Cast and Attack Range for 2 seconds.

 The teleport location is always the ability's current cast range + 100 from Tinker's position when he threw the flare.
npc_dota_hero_tinker.tinker_keen_teleport: CHANNELED - Teleport to a target friendly structure. Level 2 allows teleporting to friendly units and Level 3 to friendly heroes.
npc_dota_hero_tinker.tinker_rearm: CHANNELED - Resets the cooldown on Tinker's abilities.
npc_dota_hero_tinker.tinker_eureka: Tinker gains 1% item cooldown reduction per 3 Intelligence, up to a maximum of 60%.

npc_dota_hero_sniper.sniper_shrapnel: Consumes a charge to launch a ball of shrapnel that showers the target area in explosive pellets. Enemies are subject to damage and slowed movement. Reveals the targeted area. Shrapnel charges restore every 35 seconds.
npc_dota_hero_sniper.sniper_headshot: Sniper increases his accuracy, giving him a chance to deal extra damage and knock back his enemies. Knockback distance increases based on how close the enemy is to Sniper. Headshots briefly slow enemy movement and attack speed by -100%.
npc_dota_hero_sniper.sniper_take_aim: Increases vision range, Headshot chance, and attack range. Slows you by 65% for the duration and restricts your vision to a frontal cone.
npc_dota_hero_sniper.sniper_concussive_grenade: Launches a grenade at the target area, dealing damage to enemies and knocking them and Sniper himself back. Enemies affected are disarmed and have their movement slowed after the knockback.
npc_dota_hero_sniper.sniper_assassinate: Sniper locks onto a target enemy unit and, after a short aiming duration, fires a devastating shot that delivers an amplified attack plus bonus damage at long range and mini-stuns the target. Whenever Sniper kills an enemy hero, Assassinate is refreshed.

npc_dota_hero_necrolyte.necrolyte_death_pulse: Necrophos releases a wave of death around him, dealing damage to enemy units and healing allied units.
npc_dota_hero_necrolyte.necrolyte_ghost_shroud: Necrophos slips into the realm that separates the living from the dead. Unable to attack or be attacked, he emits an aura that slows enemies around him. He takes additional magic damage in this form, but his restorative powers are amplified.
npc_dota_hero_necrolyte.necrolyte_heartstopper_aura: Necrophos stills the hearts of his opponents, causing nearby enemy units to lose a percentage of their max health over time.
npc_dota_hero_necrolyte.necrolyte_death_seeker: Necrophos turns into a large Death Pulse towards the target unit's position. Once it arrives to the location, the Death Pulse spreads towards nearby enemies and allies.
npc_dota_hero_necrolyte.necrolyte_sadist: Necrophos gains stacking regen for 8 seconds for each unit he kills. Hero kills multiply the effect.
npc_dota_hero_necrolyte.necrolyte_reapers_scythe: Stuns the target enemy hero, then deals damage based on how much life it is missing. If Necrophos kills an enemy this way, he'll permanently gain Health and Mana Regen. Any kill under this effect is credited to Necrophos.

npc_dota_hero_warlock.warlock_fatal_bonds: Binds several visible enemy units together, causing a percentage of the damage dealt to one of them to be felt by the others.
npc_dota_hero_warlock.warlock_shadow_word: Warlock whispers an incantation, casting a spell on a unit that makes it deal damage to nearby enemy units and heal nearby ally units. Target Unit will also heal or be damaged depending on whether they are ally or enemy.
npc_dota_hero_warlock.warlock_upheaval: CHANNELED - A powerful slowing and damaging current that grows stronger as it's channeled. Lasts up to 10 seconds. Enemies are slowed for 1 second after leaving the area or the spell ends.
npc_dota_hero_warlock.warlock_eldritch_summoning: Whenever an enemy unit dies while afflicted by one or more of Warlock's abilities, a minor imp is summoned that lasts for 15 seconds and explodes on death. Imps will automatically seek out nearby units, favoring fatally bonded heroes, and will explode when reaching their prey.
npc_dota_hero_warlock.warlock_rain_of_chaos: Summons a Golem from the depths, stunning enemies for 0.8 seconds. The Golem lives 60 seconds, takes reduced damage from spells, has increased Slow Resistance, has Permanent Immolation and Flaming Fists on attack.

npc_dota_hero_beastmaster.beastmaster_wild_axes: Beastmaster sends his axes flying and calls them home again, slicing through enemy units and trees along their path. Each axe can hit an enemy once, and amplifies subsequent damage from Beastmaster and his units.
npc_dota_hero_beastmaster.beastmaster_call_of_the_wild_boar: Beastmaster calls forth a Boar to aid in the battlefield. The Boar has a passive poison attack that slows attack and movement speeds.
npc_dota_hero_beastmaster.beastmaster_call_of_the_wild_hawk: Beastmaster summons a hawk that circles around Beastmaster and dive-bombs at enemies with a base attack rate of every 4s, damaging and rooting them. Attack rate increases with the Hawk's attack speed. Prioritizes heroes.
npc_dota_hero_beastmaster.beastmaster_inner_beast: Untaps the inner fury of Beastmaster and units he controls, passively increasing their attack speed.
npc_dota_hero_beastmaster.beastmaster_drums_of_slom:
Attacks from Beastmaster or a nearby unit he controls will cause him bang his drum, dealing damage to nearby units and healing Beastmaster and units under his control for a portion of the damage dealt. Every attack decreases the interval between drum hits down to a minimum of 0.5s between hits after 20 attacks. If no attacks are made, the intervals gradually increase.

Using Primal Roar counts as 10 attacks.
npc_dota_hero_beastmaster.beastmaster_primal_roar: Beastmaster lets loose a deafening roar that stuns, and shoves open a path to its target. All units in the path of the roar are damaged, while units shoved aside by the roar have their movement and attack speed slowed. Additionally, Beastmaster and his units gain 40% movement speed for 2 seconds.
npc_dota_hero_beastmaster.beastmaster_rugged: Beastmaster's melee hero Damage Block Chance is increased from 50% to 100% versus non-hero units and non-building units.

npc_dota_hero_queenofpain.queenofpain_shadow_strike: Hurls a poisoned dagger which deals large initial damage, and then deals damage over time. The poisoned unit has its movement speed slowed for 16 seconds. An instance of damage is dealt every 3 seconds.
npc_dota_hero_queenofpain.queenofpain_blink: Short distance teleportation that allows Queen of Pain to move in and out of combat.
npc_dota_hero_queenofpain.queenofpain_scream_of_pain: The Queen of Pain lets loose a piercing scream around her, damaging nearby enemies.
npc_dota_hero_queenofpain.queenofpain_succubus: All sources of Spell Lifesteal also apply to Pure Damage. Queen of Pain gains Spell Lifesteal that increases with proximity to her enemies. Lifesteal is at its maximum when the enemy is 150 units or closer to her and at its minimum when the enemy is 800 units or further from her.
npc_dota_hero_queenofpain.queenofpain_sonic_wave: Creates a gigantic wave of sound in front of Queen of Pain, dealing heavy damage to all enemy units in its wake and pushing them back.

npc_dota_hero_venomancer.venomancer_venomous_gale: Launches a ball of venom in a line, poisoning enemy units so that they take both initial damage and damage over time, as well as suffering slowed movement. Venomous Gale deals damage every 3 seconds over its duration.
npc_dota_hero_venomancer.venomancer_poison_sting: Adds poison damage to Venomancer's normal attacks and slowing movement speed.
npc_dota_hero_venomancer.venomancer_plague_ward: Summons a plague ward to attack enemy units and structures. The ward is immune to magic. Wards gain the Poison Sting level from Venomancer, dealing 50% of the full damage.
npc_dota_hero_venomancer.venomancer_sepsis: Venomancer's attacks deal extra damage based on how many debuffs the attack target has. Extra damage is dealt as magical damage. Only counts debuffs from Venomancer or his Plague Wards.
npc_dota_hero_venomancer.venomancer_noxious_plague: Infects an enemy with a deadly plague that does an initial burst of damage and additional damage over time based on the unit's maximum health. The plague slows the target and nearby enemies based on their distance to the target. When the target dies or the debuff expires, all nearby enemies are infected with a noncommunicable version of the plague.

npc_dota_hero_faceless_void.faceless_void_time_walk: Rushes to a target location while backtracking any damage taken the last 2 seconds.
npc_dota_hero_faceless_void.faceless_void_time_dilation: Faceless Void traps all nearby enemies in a time dilation field for 7 seconds, extending their cooldowns and slowing their movement and attack speed by 4%, amplified by each cooldown extended. Deals bonus damage per second for each cooldown.
npc_dota_hero_faceless_void.faceless_void_time_lock: Adds the chance for an attack to lock an enemy unit in time while attacking it a second time.
npc_dota_hero_faceless_void.faceless_void_time_walk_reverse: Available for 1.5 seconds after landing Time Walk. If used in this period, you will reverse your time walk back to your previous cast location. Does not affect health or proc scepter hits.
npc_dota_hero_faceless_void.faceless_void_distortion_field: Enemy Attack Projectiles within 600 radius are slowed by 35%.

npc_dota_hero_skeleton_king.skeleton_king_hellfire_blast: Wraith King sears an enemy unit with spectral fire, dealing damage and stunning, then dealing damage over time and slowing the target.
npc_dota_hero_skeleton_king.skeleton_king_mortal_strike: Wraith King passively deals bonus damage on an attack with a cooldown.
npc_dota_hero_skeleton_king.skeleton_king_vampiric_spirit: Grants Wraith King Lifesteal. When slain Wraith King turns into a free pathing Wraith with Bonus Attack and Movement Speed for a short duration, delaying his death. Wraith King cannot reincarnate after being a Wraith.
npc_dota_hero_skeleton_king.skeleton_king_reincarnation: Wraith King's form regroups after death, allowing him to resurrect when killed in battle. Upon death, enemy units in a 600 radius are slowed. Can be self-cast to kill Wraith King instantly.

npc_dota_hero_death_prophet.death_prophet_carrion_swarm: Sends a swarm of winged beasts to savage enemy units in front of Death Prophet.
npc_dota_hero_death_prophet.death_prophet_silence: Fires a projectile that prevents enemy units in a target area from casting spells.
npc_dota_hero_death_prophet.death_prophet_spirit_siphon: Creates a spirit link between Death Prophet and an enemy unit, draining health from the enemy.
npc_dota_hero_death_prophet.death_prophet_exorcism: Unleashes evil spirits to drain the life of nearby enemy units and structures. Spirits need to return back to Death Prophet in order to attack again. At the end of the spell's duration, Death Prophet is healed in proportion to the damage dealt. Deals 50% damage to buildings. Lasts 40 seconds.

npc_dota_hero_phantom_assassin.phantom_assassin_stifling_dagger: Throws a dagger slowing the enemy unit's movement speed, dealing 65+30% of Phantom Assassin's attack damage as physical damage and applying attack effects from items and abilities.
npc_dota_hero_phantom_assassin.phantom_assassin_phantom_strike: Teleports to a unit, friendly or enemy, and grants bonus attack speed while attacking if it's an enemy unit.
npc_dota_hero_phantom_assassin.phantom_assassin_blur: Phantom Assassin blurs her body, disjointing incoming projectiles, increasing her movement speed, causing her to be impossible to see until she comes near enemy heroes or towers.
npc_dota_hero_phantom_assassin.phantom_assassin_fan_of_knives: Phantom Assassin releases sharp blades around her, dealing a percentage of each victim's max health on impact and applying Break.
npc_dota_hero_phantom_assassin.phantom_assassin_immaterial:
Phantom Assassin focuses inward, increasing her ability to evade enemy attacks. Evasion improves with Phantom Assassin's levels. 

Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
npc_dota_hero_phantom_assassin.phantom_assassin_coup_de_grace: Phantom Assassin refines her combat abilities, acquiring a chance of gaining Deadly Focus with each attack. When attacking with Deadly Focus, Phantom Assassin will consume the buff and guarantee a critical hit. Stifling Dagger has a bonus chance to cause Deadly Focus.

npc_dota_hero_pugna.pugna_nether_blast: An exploding pulse deals damage to enemies and structures in the area. Deals 65% damage to structures.
npc_dota_hero_pugna.pugna_decrepify: A powerful banishing spell that slows a unit and renders it unable to attack or be attacked. Healing on affected allies is increased, while afflicted enemies take extra magic damage instead.
npc_dota_hero_pugna.pugna_nether_ward: Pugna places a Nether Ward at the target location. The ward will fire at any enemy hero who casts a spell dealing base damage plus the damage multiplier of the mana spent by the enemy hero.
npc_dota_hero_pugna.pugna_oblivion_savant: Pugna can cast spells and use items while channeling.
npc_dota_hero_pugna.pugna_life_drain:
CHANNELED - When cast on an enemy, Pugna drains health from the target enemy unit to heal himself and granting vision over the target.

When cast on an ally, Pugna will drain his own health into his ally.

npc_dota_hero_templar_assassin.templar_assassin_refraction: Templar Assassin becomes highly elusive, gaining a small barrier and bonus to her damage. The damage and avoidance effects are separate, and have a limited number of instances. If a barrier is consumed, a new one is created as long as there are charges left. If an instance of damage would deal more damage than the remaining barrier, all of the damage is absorbed.
npc_dota_hero_templar_assassin.templar_assassin_meld: Templar Assassin conceals herself, becoming invisible as long as she remains still. If Meld's invisibility is broken by attacking an enemy, Lanaya's attack will deal bonus damage to the enemy and reduce their armor for 6 seconds.
npc_dota_hero_templar_assassin.templar_assassin_psi_blades: Templar Assassin's psi blades slice through the attacked unit, splitting and damaging enemy units directly behind it, while gaining bonus attack range. For each unit it damages, the split damage is reduced by a percentage.
npc_dota_hero_templar_assassin.templar_assassin_trap:
Springs the trap nearest to Templar Assassin, slowing nearby enemies. 

If the ability is in alt-cast state, springs the trap that is closest to the mouse cursor.
npc_dota_hero_templar_assassin.templar_assassin_trap_teleport: CHANNELED - Allows Templar Assassin to teleport to any Psionic Trap after channeling for 2 seconds, detonating it upon arrival as if it was fully charged and instantly dealing 400 bonus damage. Channeling Psionic Projection does not break Meld.
npc_dota_hero_templar_assassin.templar_assassin_psionic_trap: Templar Assassin places mystical traps that invisibly monitor enemy movement. When sprung at her command, they deal a small amount of damage and exert a slowing influence of 20% in a 400 radius. Traps charge up to slow 50% after 3.5 seconds. Deals bonus damage when fully charged.
npc_dota_hero_templar_assassin.templar_assassin_third_eye: Templar Assassin and her teammates can see Roshan's respawn timer.

npc_dota_hero_viper.viper_poison_attack: Intensifies Viper's venom, adding an effect to his normal attack that applies a stacking movement speed slow and magic resistance deduction while dealing damage over time. Stacks up to 6 times.
npc_dota_hero_viper.viper_nethertoxin: Viper releases a Nethertoxin at the targeted area. Units in that area take an increasing damage over time based on how long they remain in it. Units in it have their attack speed slowed.
npc_dota_hero_viper.viper_corrosive_skin: Viper exudes an infectious toxin that damages and slows the attack speed of any enemy that damages it in a 1200 radius. The acid exudate also increases Viper's resistance to magic.
npc_dota_hero_viper.viper_nose_dive: Viper slams into the ground, releasing a Nethertoxin and splattering each enemy in a 500 AoE for 4 seconds with the effect of Corrosive Skin.
npc_dota_hero_viper.viper_viper_strike: Viper slows the targeted enemy unit's movement and attack speed while also disabling their passives and dealing poison damage over time. The slowing effect reduces over the duration of the poison.

npc_dota_hero_luna.luna_lucent_beam: Calls a beam of lunar energy down upon an enemy, damaging and briefly stunning them.
npc_dota_hero_luna.luna_lunar_orbit: Creates 4 glaives that rotate 225 radius around Luna. Any enemy unit that collides with a glaive will take a percentage of Luna's Attack Damage.
npc_dota_hero_luna.luna_moon_glaive: Empowers Luna's glaives, causing her attacks to bounce between enemy units. Deals less damage with each bounce.
npc_dota_hero_luna.luna_lunar_blessing: Grants attack damage to Luna and nearby allied heroes, with Luna receiving double the attack damage bonuses. At night, Lunar Blessing is global, and Luna is blessed with additional night vision.
npc_dota_hero_luna.luna_eclipse: Showers random nearby enemies with strikes from Luna's current level of Lucent Beam. These beams do not stun their targets, and there is a maximum number of times that a single target can be struck. Also turns day into night for a short time.

npc_dota_hero_dragon_knight.dragon_knight_breathe_fire: Unleashes a breath of fire in front of Dragon Knight that burns enemies and reduces the damage their attacks deal.
npc_dota_hero_dragon_knight.dragon_knight_dragon_tail: Dragon Knight smites an enemy unit in melee range with his shield, stunning it and dealing damage. When in Elder Dragon Form, the cast range increases to 450.
npc_dota_hero_dragon_knight.dragon_knight_dragon_blood: The life blood of the Dragon improves Dragon Knight's attacks. When in Dragon form, these effects are stronger.
npc_dota_hero_dragon_knight.dragon_knight_fireball: Ignites an area, dealing damage over time that lingers on enemies in it. Has reduced cast range when melee.
npc_dota_hero_dragon_knight.dragon_knight_elder_dragon_form: Dragon Knight takes the form of one of three powerful elder dragons. Increases movement speed, attack damage, and Wyrm's Wrath effects. Attacks apply Wyrm's Wrath on-hit effects and a percentage of the attack damage to all enemies near the target. Increases Dragon Tail range. Increases health regeneration and armor bonuses from Dragon Blood.
npc_dota_hero_dragon_knight.dragon_knight_inherited_vigor: The life blood of the Dragon improves Dragon Knight's health regeneration and armor. Amount for both values is increased by 0.5 per level and is multiplied when in Dragon Form.

npc_dota_hero_dazzle.dazzle_poison_touch: Releases a cone of poison that strikes multiple enemy units. Deals damage over time and slows the targets. Anytime the targets get attacked by Dazzle, the debuff duration is refreshed and slow is increased.
npc_dota_hero_dazzle.dazzle_shallow_grave: An ally blessed with Shallow Grave, no matter how close to death, cannot die while under its protection. Healing on that ally is also amplified for the duration based on the hero's HP.
npc_dota_hero_dazzle.dazzle_shadow_wave: Sends out a bolt of power that arcs between allies, healing them while damaging any enemy units standing nearby. Dazzle is always healed by Shadow Wave.
npc_dota_hero_dazzle.dazzle_innate_weave: Dazzle's abilities apply Weave to both allies and enemies they affect, increasing allied armor and reducing enemy armor. Multiple instances of this effect stack.
npc_dota_hero_dazzle.dazzle_nothl_projection: Dazzle departs his body, traveling through the Nothl Realm as an invulnerable spirit that can cast spells, attack, and use items, leaving his body behind in the world with a visible tether. While active, Dazzle's basic abilities are empowered: Poison Touch hexes enemies, Shallow Grave heals upon expiration, and Shadow Wave has a shorter cooldown. The effect can be ended early, and Dazzle returns to the body at the end.
npc_dota_hero_dazzle.dazzle_nothl_projection_end: Ends Dazzle's sojourn in the Nothl Realm and returns his spirit to his body.

npc_dota_hero_rattletrap.rattletrap_battery_assault: Discharges high-powered shrapnel at random nearby enemy units, dealing minor magical damage and ministun.
npc_dota_hero_rattletrap.rattletrap_power_cogs:
Forms a ring of energized cogs around Clockwerk, trapping any units that are near. Enemies outside the trap that touch a cog are knocked back, losing health and mana. Once a cog has delivered a shock, it will power down. Damage is increased by 50% of the mana burned.

 Cogs can be destroyed by enemy attacks, but Clockwerk can push them up to 1000 distance away with one hit.
npc_dota_hero_rattletrap.rattletrap_rocket_flare: Fires a global range flare that explodes over a given area. Upon impact, enemies in the area take damage and are briefly slowed. Rocket flare provides vision over the impact area for 6 seconds.
npc_dota_hero_rattletrap.rattletrap_overclocking: Supercharges Clockwerks abilities: Battery Assault affects all enemies in its range; Clockwerk's attack speed in Power Cogs is increased; Rocket Flares have a reduced cooldown and fire additional rockets to either side of the target; Hookshot stun radius and duration is increased; Jetpack moves faster. Clockwerk's movement and attack speed becomes slowed to a crawl after the duration runs out.
npc_dota_hero_rattletrap.rattletrap_jetpack: Clockwerk activates a jetpack, gaining flying movement, flying vision, and bonus movement speed. Clockwerk has a severely-limited turn rate during this time and cannot attack. Jetpack can be toggled on and off for the duration of the buff.
npc_dota_hero_rattletrap.rattletrap_hookshot: Fires a grappling device rapidly at the target location. If the hook hits a unit, Clockwerk launches himself into the target, stunning and dealing damage to everyone in a 175 radius around the hit target. Any enemies Clockwerk collides with along the way are damaged and stunned.
npc_dota_hero_rattletrap.rattletrap_armor_power: Clockwerk's outgoing damage increases by 0.25% per point of armor.

npc_dota_hero_leshrac.leshrac_split_earth: Splits the earth under enemies. Deals damage and stuns for a short duration.
npc_dota_hero_leshrac.leshrac_diabolic_edict: Saturates the area around Leshrac with magical explosions that deal pure damage to enemy units and buildings. The fewer units available to attack, the more damage those units will take.
npc_dota_hero_leshrac.leshrac_lightning_storm: Summons a lightning storm that blasts the target enemy unit, then strikes any nearby enemy units. Struck enemies have their move speed slowed.
npc_dota_hero_leshrac.leshrac_greater_lightning_storm: Causes Leshrac and all nearby enemies to turn ethereal, preventing them from attacking, slowing them, and making them take more magic damage. Increases Leshrac's speed rather than reducing it. Does not cause Leshrac to take amplified damage.
npc_dota_hero_leshrac.leshrac_pulse_nova: Creates waves of damaging energy around Leshrac, one per second, to damage nearby enemy units. Drains Leshrac's mana with each pulse.

npc_dota_hero_furion.furion_sprout: Sprouts a ring of trees around a unit, damaging and trapping it in place and providing vision in a 250 radius.
npc_dota_hero_furion.furion_teleportation: Teleports to any point on the map. Gains a barrier after arriving to its destination.
npc_dota_hero_furion.furion_force_of_nature: Converts an area of trees into Treants under the command of Nature's Prophet.
npc_dota_hero_furion.furion_curse_of_the_forest: Applies a curse on all enemy heroes within 900 range, displaying them in fog, slowing them, and dealing damage over time based on the number of trees within 250 radius. Treants count as trees for this purpose.
npc_dota_hero_furion.furion_spirit_of_the_forest: Nature's Prophet gains 2% bonus damage for each tree within 300 and a multiplier of that same bonus for each treant within 1200 distance of him.
npc_dota_hero_furion.furion_wrath_of_nature: Damaging energy bounces around the map, striking enemies that are in vision starting with those closest to the cast point. Each enemy hit beyond the first adds damage, up to the maximum after 16 are hit.

npc_dota_hero_life_stealer.life_stealer_rage:
Launch into a maddened rage, becoming Debuff Immune and increasing magic resistance.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
npc_dota_hero_life_stealer.life_stealer_open_wounds: Lifestealer rends an enemy unit, slowing the victim's movement speed and allowing all allies to regain health for a percentage of the damage they deal to that unit. The victim recovers movement speed over the duration.
npc_dota_hero_life_stealer.life_stealer_ghoul_frenzy: Passively grants Lifestealer Movement and Attack Speed.
npc_dota_hero_life_stealer.life_stealer_feast: Lifestealer's attacks deal damage and provide heal for a percentage of his target's max health. Allows Lifestealer to attack allied creeps at 75% health. Lifestealer gains permanent max HP whenever he kills a creep or hero.
npc_dota_hero_life_stealer.life_stealer_infest:
Lifestealer infests the body of a target unit, becoming undetectable, and healing for a portion of his max hitpoints every second while inside. He can then explode from the host body, dealing damage to nearby enemies. If the infested unit is an enemy creep or a neutral creep, he can take control of the unit's ability to move and attack, and the creep loses a portion of their max hitpoints over time. Does not work on enemy heroes.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
npc_dota_hero_life_stealer.life_stealer_consume: Lifestealer eats the host body from the inside out, exploding from within.

npc_dota_hero_dark_seer.dark_seer_vacuum: Dark Seer creates a vacuum over the target area that sucks in enemy units, disrupting them and dealing damage.
npc_dota_hero_dark_seer.dark_seer_ion_shell: Surrounds the target unit with a bristling shield that damages enemy units in an area around it.
npc_dota_hero_dark_seer.dark_seer_surge: Charges a target friendly unit with power, giving it a brief burst of phased movement speed. Allows the unit to reach maximum movement speed and cannot be slowed.
npc_dota_hero_dark_seer.dark_seer_normal_punch: Passive ability. Causes Dark Seer's next attack on a hero to have True Strike, knock a replica out of the victim, damaging and stunning them based on how far Dark Seer has moved in the past 3 seconds. Max power is reached after 1100 distance moved.
npc_dota_hero_dark_seer.dark_seer_aggrandize: When Dark Seer levels up, he restores a percentage of his max health and mana. Restore percentage is equal to 10% + 1.5% per hero level.
npc_dota_hero_dark_seer.dark_seer_wall_of_replica: Raises a wall of warping light that slows, damages, and creates replicas of any enemy hero who crosses it. Enemy replicas serve at the Dark Seer's will. Replicas last until they are destroyed, or until the wall's duration ends.

npc_dota_hero_clinkz.clinkz_strafe:
Clinkz gains attack speed and has bonus attack range. Any current Skeleton Archers within a 1200 radius of Clinkz also gain bonus attack range and 50% of the attack speed bonus. 

 Casting Strafe does not break Skeleton Walk invisibility.
npc_dota_hero_clinkz.clinkz_searing_arrows:
Imbues Clinkz's arrows with fire for extra damage.

Skeleton Archers will fire Searing Arrows at targets Clinkz attacks for 50% damage.
npc_dota_hero_clinkz.clinkz_death_pact: Clinkz consumes the target enemy creep or friendly Skeleton Archer, healing and gaining max health. Does not take Clinkz out of Skeleton Walk.
npc_dota_hero_clinkz.clinkz_burning_barrage: CHANNELED - Clinkz channels and shoots multiple piercing arrows in the target direction that hit all enemy units dealing a percentage of Clinkz' attack damage and applying attack modifiers.
npc_dota_hero_clinkz.clinkz_burning_army: Summons a row of Burning Skeleton Archers in the target location.
npc_dota_hero_clinkz.clinkz_wind_walk:
Clinkz moves invisibly through units until the moment he attacks or uses items. Leaving Skeleton Walk creates Skeleton Archers.

Skeleton Archers are immobile and die within multiple attacks from a hero or tower. Skeleton Archers deal a percentage of Clinkz' damage, and deal 25% less damage to buildings. Attack range is equal to Clinkz' attack range.
npc_dota_hero_clinkz.clinkz_infernal_shred:
Clinkz and his skeletons apply a stacking debuff that causes their attacks to pierce up to 20% of the target's total physical armor (does not reduce their armor). Clinkz applies 2% per attack, and skeletons apply 1%. 

Lasts 5 seconds.

npc_dota_hero_omniknight.omniknight_purification: Instantly heals a friendly unit and damages all nearby enemy units.
npc_dota_hero_omniknight.omniknight_martyr: Grants Debuff Immunity with 60% magic resistance to the target, as well as bonus Strength and HP Regen based on the amount of Debuffs on them.
npc_dota_hero_omniknight.omniknight_hammer_of_purity: Omniknight imbues his hammer with holy power, causing his attack to have increased range, deal pure damage based on a percentage of his base damage and slow his target for a short duration.
npc_dota_hero_omniknight.omniknight_degen_aura: Degenerates the movement capabilities of enemy units that stray too near.
npc_dota_hero_omniknight.omniknight_guardian_angel: Omniknight calls upon a Guardian Angel that grants immunity from physical damage to allied units in an area.

npc_dota_hero_enchantress.enchantress_impetus: Places an enchantment on each attack while activated, causing it to deal additional damage based on how far away the target is. The farther the target, the greater the damage dealt. Deals double damage to illusions.
npc_dota_hero_enchantress.enchantress_enchant:
Enchantress charms an enemy. If the enemy is a hero, they are dispelled and slowed for 3.5s.

 If the enemy is a creep, she brings it under her control and receives 40% of their experience bounty. Enchantress can control creeps for up to 30s. 

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
npc_dota_hero_enchantress.enchantress_natures_attendants: A cloud of wisps heals Enchantress and any friendly units nearby.
npc_dota_hero_enchantress.enchantress_bunny_hop: Leaps backward, dodges incoming projectiles, and launches an Impetus attack on the 2 furthest enemy units within Enchantress' attack range + 100.
npc_dota_hero_enchantress.enchantress_little_friends: Enchantress roots an enemy unit. All creeps, ally, enemy and neutral within a radius will gain bonus movement and attack speed and attack the chosen target for 6 seconds.
npc_dota_hero_enchantress.enchantress_untouchable: Enchantress beguiles her enemies, slowing their attacks when she is attacked.
npc_dota_hero_enchantress.enchantress_rabblerouser: All neutral camps and Creeps under Enchantress' control deal more damage to enemy heroes.

npc_dota_hero_huskar.huskar_inner_fire: In a fiery rage, knocks all nearby enemies away from you to a fixed distance, dealing damage and silencing them.
npc_dota_hero_huskar.huskar_burning_spear: Huskar sets his spears aflame, dealing damage over time with his regular attack. Multiple attacks will stack additional damage. Each attack drains some of Huskar's health.
npc_dota_hero_huskar.huskar_berserkers_blood: Huskar's injuries feed his power, giving increased attack speed, magic resistance and health regen based on missing health. Health regen is a percentage of your strength.
npc_dota_hero_huskar.huskar_blood_magic: Huskar does not have mana. Mana costs of items are converted into health costs.Huskar's Health Costs are Magical Damage and can be reduced by Magic Resist.
npc_dota_hero_huskar.huskar_life_break:
Huskar draws upon his health to break an enemy's life, leaping at a target to shatter a percentage of that hero's current health and slow both their movement and attack speed. While leaping, Huskar is Debuff Immune and has 60% increased magic resistance.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

npc_dota_hero_night_stalker.night_stalker_void: Creates a damaging void that slows an enemy unit and deals damage. At night, Void also mini-stuns, interrupting channeling abilities, and its effects lasts longer.
npc_dota_hero_night_stalker.night_stalker_crippling_fear: Night Stalker horrifies all nearby enemies, causing them to become silenced and take damage over time while near him. The effect lasts longer at night.
npc_dota_hero_night_stalker.night_stalker_hunter_in_the_night: Night Stalker is in his element at night, attacking and moving with great swiftness.
npc_dota_hero_night_stalker.night_stalker_darkness: Night Stalker smothers the sun and summons instant darkness, so that he might use his powers at their fullest. Night Stalker gains flight and bonus damage during this time. Has unobstructed vision.
npc_dota_hero_night_stalker.night_stalker_heart_of_darkness: During the night, Night Stalker's health regeneration is increased by 20%.

npc_dota_hero_broodmother.broodmother_insatiable_hunger: A violent lust for vital fluids increases Broodmother's attack damage and gives her a vampiric attack.
npc_dota_hero_broodmother.broodmother_spin_web:
Spins a large web that grants Broodmother a passive movement speed increase and increases her Turn Rate, while in its vicinity, as well as giving free movement.

Spin Web can be cast from anywhere as long as the new web touches an existing web. Webs never expire, and can be manually destroyed. When the maximum limit of webs is exceeded, the oldest web disappears.
npc_dota_hero_broodmother.broodmother_incapacitating_bite: Broodmother's venom cripples enemy units, causing her attacks to slow and giving the affected unit a chance to miss its attacks and extra damage from attacks.
npc_dota_hero_broodmother.broodmother_spiders_milk: Whenever Broodmother kills a unit, she and all units under her control in a 600 radius receive a buff that heals them for a percentage of the victims health every 0.5 seconds. Healing from creeps is reduced by 40%.
npc_dota_hero_broodmother.broodmother_spawn_spiderlings: Broodmother injects her young into an enemy unit, dealing damage and slowing them for 4 seconds. The spiderlings will hatch if the target is killed while under this influence.

npc_dota_hero_bounty_hunter.bounty_hunter_shuriken_toss: Hurls a deadly shuriken at an enemy unit, dealing damage and slowing the target's Movement Speed by 100% for 0.35s. The shuriken will bounce to any Tracked units who are within a 1200 radius of each other.
npc_dota_hero_bounty_hunter.bounty_hunter_jinada: Bounty Hunter plans his next hit, dealing bonus damage and stealing some unreliable gold.
npc_dota_hero_bounty_hunter.bounty_hunter_wind_walk: Bounty Hunter becomes invisible and gains the ability to move through other units until he attacks or uses an ability. If he breaks the invisibility with an attack, that attack will stun the target for a short duration.
npc_dota_hero_bounty_hunter.bounty_hunter_wind_walk_ally: Applies Shadow Walk and all of its bonuses to the target ally. Allied fade time is 0.5s. Does not break Bounty Hunter's invisibility when cast.
npc_dota_hero_bounty_hunter.bounty_hunter_big_game_hunter: When getting a kill or assist on an enemy that has a killing streak, Bounty Hunter receives 20% extra gold.
npc_dota_hero_bounty_hunter.bounty_hunter_track: Tracks an enemy hero, granting True Sight of the target, increasing the damage they take and providing information on how much gold it is carrying. Bounty Hunter moves fast when near the tracked unit. If the target dies, Bounty Hunter and nearby heroes collect a bonus bounty of gold. Casting Track does not take you out of invisibility.

npc_dota_hero_weaver.weaver_the_swarm: Weaver launches a swarm of 12 young Weavers that latch on any enemy unit in their path, attacking and reducing armor until it is killed.
npc_dota_hero_weaver.weaver_shukuchi: Weaver shifts out of visibility, gaining max movement speed --doing harm to any enemies it passes through.
npc_dota_hero_weaver.weaver_geminate_attack: Allows Weaver to dispatch two attacks at once.
npc_dota_hero_weaver.weaver_time_lapse:
Weaver warps backward to whatever position it was in five seconds earlier--regaining the HP and mana from that time. No effect on cooldown, gold or experience.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
npc_dota_hero_weaver.weaver_rewoven: Every time Weaver casts an ability, he gains 50 attack range for 7s. This effect stacks independently.

npc_dota_hero_jakiro.jakiro_dual_breath: An icy blast followed by a wave of fire launches out in a path in front of Jakiro. The ice slows enemies, while the fire delivers damage over time.
npc_dota_hero_jakiro.jakiro_ice_path: Creates a path of ice that stuns and damages enemies that touch it.
npc_dota_hero_jakiro.jakiro_liquid_fire: Jakiro burns his enemies in an area of effect with fire added to his attack, while slowing their attacks. Shares a cooldown with Liquid Frost.
npc_dota_hero_jakiro.jakiro_liquid_ice: Jakiro chill his enemies with ice added to his attack, slowing movement for 5 seconds and increasing damage taken from Jakiro's attacks and abilities. This effect does not apply to buildings. Shares a cooldown with Liquid Fire.
npc_dota_hero_jakiro.jakiro_double_trouble: Jakiro's attacks launch an attack from each head, but deal less damage each.
npc_dota_hero_jakiro.jakiro_macropyre: Jakiro exhales a wide line of lasting flames, which deals damage per second to any enemy units caught in the fire.

npc_dota_hero_batrider.batrider_sticky_napalm: Drenches an area in sticky oil, amplifying damage from Batrider's attacks and abilities and slowing the movement speed and turn rate of enemies. Additional casts of Sticky Napalm continue to increase damage, up to 20 stacks. Applies a small amount of damage with each cast.
npc_dota_hero_batrider.batrider_flamebreak: Hurls an explosive cocktail that explodes when it reaches the target location, knocking back, slowing and dealing damage over time to enemies in the area.
npc_dota_hero_batrider.batrider_firefly: Batrider takes to the skies, laying down a trail of flames from the air. The fire damages any enemies it touches, and destroys trees below Batrider.
npc_dota_hero_batrider.batrider_smoldering_resin: Batrider's attacks apply a debuff that deals 20% of the attack damage every 1s for 2s.
npc_dota_hero_batrider.batrider_flaming_lasso: Lassoes an enemy and drags them in Batrider's wake. Dragged units cannot move, attack, or use abilities. Teleporting or blinking will break the lasso.

npc_dota_hero_chen.chen_penitence: Damages enemy unit, forces it to move slower and lets allies attack it more quickly.
npc_dota_hero_chen.chen_holy_persuasion: Chen takes control of an enemy or neutral creep and receives a percentage of its bounty. Its maximum health is set to 400 + 50 per Chen Level. Converted creeps will have increased movement speed and bonus damage.
npc_dota_hero_chen.chen_divine_favor:
Passively provides an aura that grants increased health regeneration. Can be cast on allies to provide them with bonus armor and increasing the healing and health regeneration they receive.

If cast on Chen, all units controlled by Chen receive the buff and will be teleported to him. Taking damage from enemy heroes or their units will cancel the teleport.
npc_dota_hero_chen.chen_summon_convert:
Chen summons a convert to fight for him. The convert gains bonuses from Holy Persuasion and dies if Chen dies. Its maximum health is set to 220 + 80 per Chen Level.

 The spell stays on cooldown while the convert is alive, but refreshes whenever Chen respawns. The Convert counts towards Holy Persuasion max unit count. The Convert's ability level increases with Chen's level of Holy Persuasion.
npc_dota_hero_chen.chen_hand_of_god: Heals all allied heroes on the map as well as all units under Chen's control. A large heal is applied at first and a slow heal over time is applied for 10 seconds afterwards.

npc_dota_hero_spectre.spectre_spectral_dagger: Spectre flings a dagger to draw a Shadow Path, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed of any enemies along the trail. Units hit by the dagger also trail a Shadow Path. While treading the path, Spectre moves faster and phases through otherwise impassable terrain.
npc_dota_hero_spectre.spectre_shadow_step:
Thrusts an uncontrollable illusion at the target. The illusion receives 200% damage.

The Reality sub-ability may be used to teleport to the illusion, destroying it.
npc_dota_hero_spectre.spectre_dispersion: Damage done to Spectre is reflected on her enemies, leaving her unharmed. The effect lessens with distance.
npc_dota_hero_spectre.spectre_reality: Spectre assumes the target Shadow Step or Haunt illusion, destroying it.
npc_dota_hero_spectre.spectre_desolate: Spectre and her illusions deal bonus Pure damage if attacking an enemy that does not have any allied units within a 350 radius around them.
npc_dota_hero_spectre.spectre_haunt:
Creates a spectral nemesis to haunt all enemy Heroes.

Haunt illusions are uncontrollable, take extra damage, and deal less damage than Spectre herself. They ignore terrain.

The Reality sub-ability may be used to teleport to the illusion, destroying it.

npc_dota_hero_doom_bringer.doom_bringer_devour: Consumes an enemy or neutral creep, acquiring any special abilities that it possessed. If alt-cast is deactivated, Doom will not acquire the creep's abilities. Duration is equal to the cooldown.
npc_dota_hero_doom_bringer.doom_bringer_scorched_earth: Carpets the nearby earth in flames which damage enemies, while also granting him increased movement speed.
npc_dota_hero_doom_bringer.doom_bringer_infernal_blade: Doom swings his burning sword, igniting the enemy. Stuns for 0.6 seconds and applies a 4 second burn that deals a base damage plus a percentage of the target's Max HP as damage per second.
npc_dota_hero_doom_bringer.doom_bringer_empty1: This slot will be replaced with abilities acquired using Devour.
npc_dota_hero_doom_bringer.doom_bringer_empty2: This slot will be replaced with abilities acquired using Devour.
npc_dota_hero_doom_bringer.doom_bringer_doom:
Inflicts a curse that dispels an enemy and prevents them from casting spells or healing in any way, while taking damage over time.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
npc_dota_hero_doom_bringer.doom_bringer_lvl_pain: Doom's attacks deal 25% bonus damage to heroes whose level is lower than Doom's level.

npc_dota_hero_ancient_apparition.ancient_apparition_cold_feet: Places Death Rime Stacks on an enemy that can be dispelled by moving away from the initial cast point. If the enemy unit doesn't move outside of the given range, it will be stunned and frozen in place after 4 seconds.
npc_dota_hero_ancient_apparition.ancient_apparition_ice_vortex: Creates a vortex of icy energy that applies Death Rime Stacks and increases magic damage done to enemies in its range.
